sentences.en: Article 1 of the constitution guarantees freedom of religion.
sentences.cn: 宪法的第一条保障宗教信仰自由。

sentences.en: Ben Brantley's article on Sir Ian McKellen rekindled many memories.
sentences.cn: 本·布兰特利的那篇关于伊恩·麦凯伦爵士的文章唤起了许多记忆。
祝贺你写出这么有意思的文章。

sentences.en: Daniel finished the article and laid the newspaper down on his desk.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔看完文章后把报纸放在他的书桌上。

sentences.en: Dave Hill's article makes the right point about the Taylor Report.
sentences.cn: 戴夫·希尔的文章对《泰勒报告》的看法是正确的。

sentences.en: His article is, predictably, a scathing attack on capitalism.
sentences.cn: 可想而知，他的文章是对资本主义的严厉抨击。

sentences.en: I am writing with reference to your article on salaries for scientists.
sentences.cn: 我写此信是为了回应你那篇探讨科学家薪水的文章。

sentences.en: I have rarely read anything so insultingly sexist as this article.
sentences.cn: 我很少读到像这篇文章般带有侮辱性的性别歧视的东西。

sentences.en: I read Germaine Greer's article in the March issue with particular interest.
sentences.cn: 我饶有兴致地阅读了杰曼·格里尔在三月那期发表的文章。

sentences.en: Marling's article on Northumbria attracted a large postbag.
sentences.cn: 马林关于诺森布里亚的文章刊出后读者来信纷至沓来。

sentences.en: The article contains several misleading statements.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章有几处误导性说法。

sentences.en: The article had been full of errors and half truths.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章里尽是些错误和真假参半的内容。

sentences.en: The article was headlined "Tell us the truth".
sentences.cn: 文章题为“告诉我们真相”。

sentences.en: The paper’s leading article (=  the main article  ) described the government as weak.
The vodka was the genuine article.
There is a lengthy article on Spike Milligan in the Observer newspaper.
sentences.cn: 《观察家报》上有一篇关于斯派克·米利根的长篇文章。

sentences.en: We are grateful to you for permission to reproduce this article.
sentences.cn: 非常感谢您允许我们复印这篇文章。

words.tran_cn: 合同雇用培训的；（学徒）受契约约束的
使受协议条款的约束；指控（article的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 一件复一件 articles(或 objects) of virtu 艺术珍品,古玩,古董
特写；专题文章；深度文章
根据契约当学徒，依雇用契约工作着

trans.tran_cn: 文章，论文，报道，条约，物品，冠词
trans.tran_en: a piece of writing about a particular subject in a newspaper or magazine

trans.tran_cn: 订约将…收为学徒或见习生；使…受协议条款的约束
